CustomField.description: Number of days until contract expires. Uses Extended_End_Date if extension granted, otherwise Contract_End_Date.
CustomField.formula: IF( Extension_Granted__c = TRUE && NOT(ISBLANK(Extended_End_Date__c)), Extended_End_Date__c - TODAY(), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Contract_End_Date__c)), Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY(), NULL ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Days remaining until contract deadline (considers extensions).
CustomField.label: Days Until Contract End
